## ProgramBuilder.referenceOf() method

Creates a 'referenceOf' expression for WGSL

**Signature:**

```typescript

```

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  ptr | [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) | The pointer variable |
